title.narrative: Special Investigation Unit (SIU) 99 Basic Course, Kenya

description.narrative: Special Investigation Unit (SIU) 99 Basic Course, Kenya; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers.
